website_summaries.verdict: High-powered electric starter with a heating element designed for more coverage area.
pros: Power cord is long at close to five feet
Curvature of heating element places more of it in contact with the charcoal
cons: Design may be too large to fit inside some charcoal chimneys

customer_reviews.title: Light My Fire!
customer_reviews.text: My previous electric starters used a narrow electric element that lit a very small field of charcoal. With a Weber kettle grill, I needed a starter with a bigger, wider footprint. And the NutriChef Premium BBQ Grill Starter fills this need perfectly. Owing to the design of the element, it will set a nice, big pile of charcoal to burning. And it burns hot enough to light even on cold, wet, blustery days. And isn't a longer BBQ season what we really all want? If your needs are similar to mine, this is your answer.
customer_reviews.author: Are Mix

customer_reviews.title: Great Grilling
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product in an effort to stop using starter fluid on the coals. This starter is amazing, the size is perfect as it heats a large portion of the coals giving me an even fire. It is so simple to use and cuts my grilling time in half, it cleans up with a simple wipe of a cloth and back in its box for the next time. We are grilling this weekend at a family members house and I am taking it with me!
customer_reviews.author: Island Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Electric Fire Starter
customer_reviews.text: I used an electric fire starter on my big green egg for years until it finally gave up. This one is sturdier and larger. It barely fits in my bge. Check its dimensions before you buy. It's sturdy enough that you can keep it in touch with the coals for 15-20 minutes without fear of damage. Great starter!!!
customer_reviews.author: Henk

customer_reviews.title: On the fence about trying? Give it a shot!
customer_reviews.text: So far- great product! I have been using this to light lump charcoal in a big green egg. The starter is easier and more convenient than using the charcoal lighting squares I had previously been using- and more cost effective! The stand that is included to put the lighter on when it is hot is very helpful. If you are on the fence about this lighter- I would give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Marti Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Has paid for itself
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this charcoal lighter on a whim and glad I did. I'm not one of those who mind using lighter fluid and still do on occasion, but the money savings on lighter fluid has paid for the charcoal lighter. Place coals on top of the lighter and plug it in, sit back and wait for the flames. I haven't had any issues with element heating up as others have mentioned and I store mine under my grill in the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Bamafan31706

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: I love this design that allows the starter to fit on the bottom with charcoal piled on top. More efficient than the straight starter I had before that didn't allow the charcoal to make solid contact. Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda HendrexTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great service, even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, exactly as shown, works like a charm. Super fast shipping! So much faster than others on Amazon (I'm still waiting for some items from a different shipper... And I already got this, used it and looking forward to using it again). Awesome follow up. Do not hesitate to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Strickland

customer_reviews.title: The Price is Right
customer_reviews.text: Lots of surface area which may also lead to one of the problems. Very slow to heat and not shaped well for Big Green Eggs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great product and really convenient!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my husband for Father's Day. He grills all of the time (LOVES HIS CHARCOAL GRILL) and this gadget was incredibly helpful and he loved it. Great product and we definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marz Fam

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: The main advantage of this lighter as compared to the cheaper, standard units are the wide area of heat, which covers more coals and thus you get a more thorough flame. The long cord also eliminates the need for an extension cord. Stand is convenient to keep the heat away from the floor, although it's not quite the ideal balancing.
customer_reviews.author: gepetohong

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I hate the idea of starter fluid ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a first-time electric charcoal lighter user. I love it! I hate the idea of starter fluid hanging around the house and I'm 50/50 using a coal starting chimney. This is an awesome tool.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby Cat

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great and then after 2 months of regular use (3-4 uses weekly) it quit working. I gave it 2 stars because it was great when it worked...maybe I got the one lemon. I switched over to a small propane torch to start charcoal. Very reliable and I can start charcoal without electricity now.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Plastic handle can melt when heating charcoal.
customer_reviews.text: Handle does not hold up to fire pit heat ( it melts). However, the heating element end design is great for lighting charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Wilpers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those who hate lighter fluid
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly! It starts a charcoal fire quick without having to use smelly lighter fluid. My pit master husband loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mynoah030409

customer_reviews.title: Works Great...Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Fits perfect on all my grills (Weber, Kamoto Joe, and Green Egg). Lights fast and quick. Really like the contour of the handle. Absolutely no heat is retained in the handle!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Broughton

customer_reviews.title: ... a small mountable rack to keep it on when cool and not it
customer_reviews.text: We have used this several times it lights the charcoal really quickly and it came with a small mountable rack to keep it on when cool and not it use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: It works but it just takes a while to heat up the coals.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Best charcoal starter ever
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is great. Never been able to start charcoal faster.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: handle melted
customer_reviews.text: heated charcoal fine... but shaped wrong for an egg grill... didn't pay attention and handle melted
customer_reviews.author: dave b.

customer_reviews.title: Slow Fire Starter
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money, my old $20 starter works twice as fast. A 2 prong cord is a dead give a way. Tried it twice hoping it would start the coals faster. Nope, on average it was about 30-45 minutes to get the coals red hot. Stick with the cheapest one....
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A Rush

customer_reviews.title: Lower power draw with fast light
customer_reviews.text: This uses a lighter weight cord than previous lighters I have used. It draws 600 watts, and doesn’t pop the GFI plug as my previous lighters, while still providing a quick, clean start.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great Lighter
customer_reviews.text: Great charcoal lighter - works like a charm - its a little bigger than most which gets the charcoal going quickly but may be a little awkward in getting the bottom coals in a round grill going.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Blaufuss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice not to have to use charcoal starter fluid...heats up fast
customer_reviews.author: Judith Digiano

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: This was really fast. I had been using a charcoal stack starter with paper, to avoid using a fluid. Now I don't have the ashes from the stack starter either.
customer_reviews.author: Jak

customer_reviews.title: It arrived befor needed.
customer_reviews.text: This heater is going to work better then my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Better for the environment than burning paper in a chimney.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Russo

customer_reviews.title: This did not work well at all. Does not ...
customer_reviews.text: This did not work well at all. Does not get charcoal hot. Went back to using my old one!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G. Stancel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought it for my son-in-law and he LOVES IT!! Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job!!!
customer_reviews.text: Does a nice job of starting the charcoal rapidly. It's bigger than most of the electric starters, so it's faster. The stand is a nice feature and the long cord is more convenient. Very happy so far! Seller was great to deal with as well - fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: pshields

customer_reviews.title: Best electric fire starter. Works really fast.
customer_reviews.text: Lights up Charcoal and wood in a few minutes. No gas required. It’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Best electric lighter I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best electric lighter I've ever had. The broad design of the coils means much more contact area with the charcoal for a faster, more even light.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. Base is large enough to hold many coals.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is wide and covers a large area and the stand and hanging option is very useful
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hoot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size grill starter,covers large area of charcoal, works great.
customer_reviews.author: terry sinkfield

customer_reviews.title: Coal starter
customer_reviews.text: Works great, heats up the coals quickly, 10 minutes and no chemicals needed. Just an extension cord
customer_reviews.author: Gil C.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works almost too well. Got coals going so quick I burnt the handle
customer_reviews.author: Eggs

customer_reviews.title: Works well. It could be improved by having a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. It could be improved by having a deeper angle on the handle. Tough to put it in level into a smaller grill.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Star Product
customer_reviews.text: Best electric lighter I've used thus far...works quickly and efficiently. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ann D Getty

customer_reviews.title: Too slow heating up
customer_reviews.text: Takes too long to heat up, wouldn't buy again. Unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: B J Zeagler

customer_reviews.title: Seems simple
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. So much less expensive than the "green egg" model. Used it only once but is easy and worked well. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The large lighting element lights the grill quickly and evenly over a large area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Find!
customer_reviews.text: The best electric charcoal lighter I've ever used. Long cord and stand add to convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Tom on the Coast

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: plugged it in. Lighted the charcoal. It did what I hoped it would
customer_reviews.author: Ronald B Low

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Started charcoal very well, however did not fit in charcoal chimney.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I NEED IT FOR 220 V AND IT ONLY WORK ...
customer_reviews.text: I NEED IT FOR 220 V AND IT ONLY WORK FOR 110V, I DID NOT SEE THIS SPECIFICATION AT THE MOMENT I MAKE MY ORDER. UNFORTUNATELY I CAN NOT USE IT. REGARDS
customer_reviews.author: ELENIO COLMAN

customer_reviews.title: We figured out that we had to leave it on for about 15-20 minutes (thought nothing was happening before that) then suddenly thin
customer_reviews.text: It's larger than we thought but it ended up working out well at that size. We figured out that we had to leave it on for about 15-20 minutes (thought nothing was happening before that) then suddenly things took off and we could unplug it and the coals heated up just fine. The hanging apparatus for the charcoal lighter was an added bonus because we didn't even notice it in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: P&M

customer_reviews.title: An excellent charcoal starter
customer_reviews.text: I have a grill much like Americana Swinger Charcoal Grill and I use plain charcoal (Costco). My old charcoal starter’s element burned out, so I purchased the Nutrichef Premium BBQ Grill starter . Disadvantage: Cord does not have ground, but is longer than GrillPro 33666 (4’ 9”). Elements are thinner than the GrillPro, so may burn out more quickly. Advantages: 1) Elements are spread out wider and thus heat more charcoal. 2) It comes with a holder stand for cooling the starter. It heated the charcoal quickly - when I was finished spreading the charcoal the holder stand came in handy for cooling the starter down. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Go big or go home!
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger grill, family of 4 with two teenage boys...when I make burgers I go ahead and make a dozen and have a Chargriller smoker type grill. This starter is amazing! I only wish I would have designed it to make the money I'm going to spend every couple of years buying replacements (with heavy use they burn out, but SO worth it!) No lighter fluid, no gas grill and at 45 I've never owned a gas grill but have been using grills since I was 12 (thanks Dad!). This is so awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Be patient. Works very well!  **UPDATE** Worked well. Not anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this at first because it takes a little time to get going and light the charcoal. After using it for a while it's the only way I light my charcoal. It works great, you just have to be patient. Update: Worked for about 1 1/2 years then fell apart. I'm not sure what I'll go to next because I want something that will last. I might go back to my weed burner. The added benefit of which is that my BGE can be ready to cook in less than 2 minutes with that method, rather than the 15-20 it takes with the NutriChef.
customer_reviews.author: B Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but not good for Big Green Egg.
customer_reviews.text: Mediocre- bad shape and not hot enough. This needs more of a bend to get under the coals, it is too straight. I have an old one from another brand that has a 90 degree bend and gets much hotter. I do like the width of this one and it does eventually get the job done. I cook on a Big Green Egg and this shape does not work well, I am bending it to fit but should not have to.
customer_reviews.author: 1purchase2many

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Heats coals up quickly, but as others have noted, the angle of the portion between the handle and the coals is too shallow so it rides up on the rim, even on my relatively large BBQ, and can't be positioned level with the charcoal pan. My previous heater had a much sharper angle.
customer_reviews.author: American Consumer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products to help your grill. I don't use lighter fluid when I grill or quick light charcoal, so this grill charcoal lighter is perfect. I have a good fire in less than 20 minutes. Definitely worth the buy. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Capri

customer_reviews.title: NEVER HEATS UP
customer_reviews.text: I went through three of these trying to get them to work and none of them did. They never get hot enough, and never red in color like in the pictures. Absolute junk. I don't know how anyone is giving 5 star reviews, unless somehow I got three defective units.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get the fire going
customer_reviews.text: This product does just what it’s supposed to do, light the coals easily and quickly without anything else needed. The directions said 10-15 minutes. That’s just what it took to get white hot coals. I have a little 14” grill and it fit. I’ve only used it once and I can see there are things I can do to make it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara H

customer_reviews.title: Gets your charcoal going the right way.
customer_reviews.text: This has a larger heating/contact area than other starters I have used. Comes up to temperature in good time. Also, disturbs the coals when extracting to distribute them more tham my other elements did. I have used it 7 or 8 times now and am pleased with its functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for fireplaces
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to make it easier for her to get the fireplace going at her work place. She said it is really good. The firewood they bought this time is not seasoned and has been hard to get a fire going. This makes it musch quicker and easier for her.
customer_reviews.author: swampman

customer_reviews.title: Great bbq gear
customer_reviews.text: I had troubles starting charcoal fire for my bbq until i bump into this. Now i love to make bbq since im not spending a lot of time trying to start the fire with wood, paper, etc. Its a must have for every one
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: Wide footprint
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this starter readies more coals that the competitors I’ve used in the past. Less wait time to get started, better heat spread, and more concise cooking. Makes grilling out faster and better.
customer_reviews.author: Raymondj3

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. I've used it many times with my lump charcoal and it is very effective. Wonderful to be able to light the charcoal safely without chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Works great for coals
customer_reviews.text: Works great, gets coals super hot, fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This showed up very quickly and is exactly as advertised. The started started my charcoal very quickly and didn't leave that starter fluid smell or taste.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased purchasing this item with this company
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased purchasing this item with this company. I received this item with in 2 days. I have used this on my charcoal grill and it works great. This company reached out to me after I recieved my order to make sure I was satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Great lighter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my Vision Grill lighter. This one is faster at lighting the charcoal and seems to be more powerful. I'm liking this a whole lot.
customer_reviews.author: shawnsplace

customer_reviews.title: Reliability.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems to take a little longer to heat up than other electric charcoal heaters I've had in the past though.
customer_reviews.author: Bones

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with how fast it starts the charcoal
customer_reviews.text: goog. I am pleased with how fast it starts the charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: maritza lara

customer_reviews.title: I like the large contact surface area of this model
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. I like the large contact surface area of this model. Heats efficiently and effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband really liked the large size of the coil section.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley B

customer_reviews.title: He likes it better than the one that came recommended for the 'Egg'
customer_reviews.text: The husband LOVES the angle of the handle and the 'rest'. He likes it better than the one that came recommended for the 'Egg'.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla M.

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product. Charcoal ready in 10 minutes. No more chemicals. Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Oe

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time.. Just used it and it worked like a charm. So far so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: I have only used this once. The coals add ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this once. The coals add started faster and on a larger area than expected. I am impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bill hutson

customer_reviews.title: Good thought, poor execution.
customer_reviews.text: I have used two other electric grill starters over the last five years. I was excited to buy this one because of the wider surface area. Unfortunately I was soon disappointed by the speed at which this model heats the lump. I decided I could live with the fact it was slower than I desired, however two days ago the heating element snapped (without being subject to abuse) and is no longer usable. I just bought this in March and would guess I got about 60 uses and it is busted! What a let down. It is the most expensive, the slowest, and lasted the shortest amount of time. I would recommend against spending your money on this starter.
customer_reviews.author: FreedomLover85

product_meta.title: Upgraded NutriChef Premium BBQ Grill Starter, Fire Ignition, Reusable Electric Charcoal Starter, Campfire, Fireplace, Outdoor Cooking Equipment - 600 Watt, Black (PKCHALT5)
product_meta.description:
Tired of waiting impatiently for the grill to heat up? Not comfortable with using hazardous chemicals on your food? Then you need the NutriChef Premium BBQ Grill Starter. Quickly heat and ignite charcoal with a simple press of a button, creating not only a safer work area but a more convenient one. This tool will quickly become your favorite piece of outdoor cooking equipment.

Features:





 * Quickly Heat & Ignite Charcoal
 * Eliminates the Need of Lighter Fluid
 * High-Powered Heating Element
 * Simple Operation & Plug-in Design
 * Easy-to-Clean with Heat-Resistant Handle
 * Includes Holder Stand Base


Technical Specs:



 * High-Powered Heating Element: 600 Watt
 * Power Cord Length: 4.9' ft.
 * Power: 120V
 * Dimensions: 19.6’’ x 7.6’’ x 3.3’’
 * Sold as: 1
 * Weight: 2.46 lbs.
feature_bullets: SAFETY FIRST: The electric grill starter eliminates the need for lighter fluid and therefore ultimately reduces the risk of injury. Rest assured that it will heat up fast and efficiently, without causing you damage or leaving you waiting.

SIMPLE TO USE: The grill starter gets your grill going quickly and effortlessly with just the click of a button. The simple operation will soon make it your go-to outdoor appliance. A 4.9-foot power cord comes included.

LIGHTWEIGHT & POWERFUL: Weighing in at less than 3lbs., the barbecue grill starter features a 600-watt high-powered heating element, that will leave you marveling that something so convenient can also produce such quick and powerful results.
GO GREEN: Keep your family safe with the charcoal grill starter, which removes the need to use any environmentally-damaging chemicals. Good for you and good for the planet.
DESIGNED FOR USE: The gas grill starter was created for daily use, with must-have features like a heat-resistant handle, easy to clean surface and an included holder stand base.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars185 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
